issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Currently the analytics events are set to send events every 10 min which according to blain's comment " if the queue was empty, analytics waits 5 seconds for other events to come in before sending to the server. On a server issue, the wait for trying again is 15 seconds." should be much less to be in parity with other platforms.
fields.summary: BlackBerry : Currently the analytics events are set to been sent every 10 min which is not in parity with other platforms
